On Fri, Aug 11, 2017 at 5:39 PM, Ameya ***@***.***> wrote: Trying to install tensorflow-gpu 1.2 from source on Ubuntu-16.04. bazel version: 0.5.3 Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61 CUDNN_MAJOR 5 CUDNN_MINOR 1 CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL 5 gcc version: 4.9.3 Same error as @sounakdey <https://github.com/sounakdey> . *Note:* I have made one change to third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl as mentioned in #11871 <#11871> . Any solutions? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
@ameya sorry i did not find a solution. If you get one can you please post
